question: Which Indian Intelligence Agency compiled the Smuggling in India Report 2019-2020?
explanation: The Directorate of Revenue Intelligence compiled the Smuggling in India Report 2019-2020 wich has recently been launched by the Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman. On this occasion, The DRI Utkrisht Seva Samman, 2020 was awarded to B. Sankaran, an officer of the 1961 batch of the IRS.
